announcements.details: Listen to the homily for the 17th Sunday in Ordinary Time by Most Rev John Louis
announcements.title: Homily: 17th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 3rd August, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Thursday borns and Sacred Heart of Jesus Confraternity. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 18th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: The St Bakhita marriage school will reopen on Sunday, 3rd august, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2026 should pick up registration forms from the office of the parish priest.
announcements.title: Marriage School

announcements.details: The Archdiocesan Youth Summit Pilgrimage to Yamoussoukro, Ivory Coast comes off from the 31st of July to 4th August 2025 at a cost of GHï¿ 2,400 per person. Reach out to the church administration for registration.
announcements.title: Archdiocesan Youth Summit Pilgrimage

announcements.details: Registration for UCMAS which is a child brain development programme is ongoing. Kindly register your child for a training in concentration, self-confidence and all-round academic proficiency. Contact 0242146843 to register.
announcements.title: UCMAS Brain Development Programme
